sections.heading: The breastfeeding of a baby is an important and basic act of nurture which must be encouraged in the interests of maternal and child health and family values, and in furtherance of this goal:(1)A mother may breastfeed her baby in any location, public or private, where the mother is otherwise authori
sections.text: The breastfeeding of a baby is an important and basic act of nurture which must be encouraged in the interests of maternal and child health and family values, and in furtherance of this goal:(1)A mother may breastfeed her baby in any location, public or private, where the mother is otherwise authorized to be, irrespective of whether the nipple of the mother’s breast is uncovered during or incidental to the breastfeeding.(2)A facility lawfully providing maternity services or newborn infant care may use the designation “baby-friendly” if it establishes a breastfeeding policy in accordance with s. 383.016.History.—s. 1, ch. 93-4; s. 2, ch. 94-217.

sections.heading: The laboratory report on the serological test shall be made on a form to be provided by the Department of Health
sections.text: In submitting the sample of blood for the test, the physician shall designate that this is a pregnancy test; and the laboratory report shall state that this was a pregnancy test.History.

sections.heading: 383.30-383.332 shall be known and may be cited as the “Birth Center Licensure Act.”
